google-search-console.description: Google Search Console MCP integration for monitoring search performance, indexing status, Core Web Vitals, and AI crawler activity. Essential for GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) to track GPTBot, PerplexityBot, and other AI crawlers accessing your site.

tools.name: get_search_analytics
tools.description: Get search performance data including clicks, impressions, CTR, and position for queries and pages

tools.name: get_index_status
tools.description: Check indexing status of URLs - indexed, crawled, excluded, and errors

tools.name: submit_url_for_indexing
tools.description: Request Google to crawl and index a specific URL

tools.name: get_crawl_stats
tools.description: Get crawl statistics including requests per day, download size, and response times

tools.name: get_core_web_vitals
tools.description: Get Core Web Vitals report (LCP, FID, CLS) for mobile and desktop

tools.name: get_sitemaps
tools.description: List submitted sitemaps and their status

tools.name: submit_sitemap
tools.description: Submit a new sitemap URL for processing

tools.name: get_mobile_usability
tools.description: Get mobile usability issues and affected pages

tools.name: get_rich_results
tools.description: Check rich results status for structured data (FAQ, HowTo, etc.)

tools.name: get_security_issues
tools.description: Check for security issues like malware or hacked content

steps: 2. Create a new project or select existing one
3. Enable 'Search Console API' in APIs & Services
5. Download credentials and extract client_id and client_secret
6. Run oauth flow to get refresh_token
7. Set environment variables: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID, GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET, GOOGLE_REFRESH_TOKEN

usage_examples.description: Get top queries for last 7 days
usage_examples.prompt: Show me the top 10 search queries for my site in the last 7 days with clicks and impressions
What URLs on my site have indexing issues? Show me excluded and error pages
Check crawl stats and look for any unusual patterns that might indicate AI crawlers
What are my Core Web Vitals scores? Which pages need improvement?

geo_features.description: Features specifically useful for Generative Engine Optimization
geo_features.crawl_monitoring: Track crawl frequency changes after implementing llms.txt
geo_features.indexing_speed: Monitor how quickly new content gets indexed after IndexNow submission
geo_features.query_analysis: Identify question-based queries that LLMs might use for training
geo_features.rich_results: Ensure FAQ and HowTo schema are being recognized for AI extraction
